name: Freeway Retro
description:
(a prototype of a game from Activision for the Atari 2600)

This is an add-on to GameMaker Studio tutorial on Youtube

  • PLAYER 1 "W KEY" and "S KEY" to move up and down
  • PLAYER 2 "UP ARROW" and "DOWN ARROW" to move up and down
  • "R KEY" to Restart, "ESC" to Exit
